para.emphasis: Leading-edge projection-based reduced order models (pROMs) for dynamical systems in science and engineering.

detaileddescription.para: This the documentation of the C++ tutorials. The full project website is here.

sect1.title: Get Started
sect1.para:
Requires CMake > 3.13.0 and a C++ compiler with C++11 support: gitclonegit@github.com:Pressio/pressio-tutorials.git
exportCXX=<path-to-your-CXX-compiler> cdpressio-tutorials&&mkdirbuild&&cdbuild cmake-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release..
The executables for all tutorials are built inside the build subdirectory.

sect1.title: License and Citation
sect1.para: We are working on publishing this: you can find our arXiv preprint at: https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.07798

sect1.title: Questions?
sect1.para: Find us on Slack: https://pressioteam.slack.com or open an issue on github.
